name: MATLAB spectral clustering package
short_description: A MATLAB spectral clustering package to handle large data sets (200,000 RCV1 data) on a 4GB memory general machine. We implement various ways of approximating the dense similarity matrix, including nearest neighbors and the Nystrom method.
